statements: SELECT * FROM user_passwords;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_passwords WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_passwords WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_passwords ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_passwords;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_passwords WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_passwords WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_passwords WHERE password_hash = E'\xDEADBEEF';
SELECT * FROM user_passwords WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_passwords WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_auth;
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_auth WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profile ORDER BY profile_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT user_auth.username, user_profile.full_name FROM user_auth JOIN user_profile ON user_auth.user_id = user_profile.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_auth WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_auth ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT profile_id, full_name, email, phone_number, address FROM user_profile WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT u.username, p.full_name FROM user_auth u JOIN user_profile p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT u.username, p.email FROM user_auth u INNER JOIN user_profile p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_name) FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(role_name) > 1
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT session_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM UserPasswords;
SELECT username, user_id FROM UserPasswords;
SELECT password_hash FROM UserPasswords WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserRoles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT access_level FROM UserAccess WHERE access_level='admin';
SELECT * FROM UserPasswords ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserPasswords WHERE username LIKE 'admin%' AND password_hash = '123456';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM UserPasswords JOIN UserRoles ON UserPasswords.user_id = UserRoles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM UserPasswords JOIN UserAccess ON UserPasswords.user_id = UserAccess.access_id WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp FROM UserPasswords JOIN LoginAttempts ON UserPasswords.user_id = LoginAttempts.user_id WHERE login_success = TRUE ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
